resources:
Doppelkopf Version 3.0 About this App Saved games Delete all saved game Are you sure you want to delete ALL saved games? Are you sure you want to delete the saved game? Doppelkopf game from: *You can import this data into excel. Save data as text file and import into excel by using semicolon as separator. Important set "." (dot) as decimal seperator. Send via mail... New game Playername Add player Game Please setup minimum four players
Game settings Save game settings game settings changed Save game settings? Delete bockround Existing bockrounds will be overwritten (deleted) Edit round Edit round %1$d You can't edit this round Edit a round with a long press on the round entry Round successfully changed Error: round coudn't be changed! Active players Bocklimit Bock Bockround Bockrounds Start Start Invalid, duplication or missing player name Image 300
Payoff Calculation Factor e.g. 0,10 (only 0-9 , . valid chars) Error: Enter a valid factor (e.g. 0,05 - 0,10 - 1 - 1,5 - 2 - 10) Load game... Load saved games... Current game Count variant Add new round (wipe) Add new round Add round Round Points win lose suspended New bock rounds Count of bockrounds Games per bockround Count of bockrounds:

Define how often bockrounds will be added. 

Games per bockround:
\Defines how much games will be a bockround. 

Exampels:

Count of bockround = 1, Games per bockround = 4 will reuslt ind 4 new bockrounds total. 

Count of bockround = 2, Games per bockround = 5 will result ind 5 double bockrounds total.
Invalid values. Please check points and count of winner/loser/(suspended player) Solo 2vs2 3vs2 4vs2 3vs3
Delete file Delete files Created Filepath Error Quit game Do really want to quit this game? Error: can't start game Error: game settings couldn't be loaded
: edit Yes No OK Abort Please wait Help Apply Info none
To save games on external storage and send games as CSV-File via Mail access to external storage is needed.
Count variants Standard Loser Winner Standard: 
The losers get points subtracted, winners get points added Loser: 
Only the losing players get points subtracted. The points of the winning or suspended players will be untouched. (reverse of count variant winner). Winner: 
Only the winning player get points added. The points of the losing or suspended players will be untouched. (reverse of count variant loser). You can start a game with 5 players which have only 4 active player. This means that every round 1 player has to be suspended (This player can be set every round individually). On a bock round the round points will be doubled. Bock round limit can bet set between 0–4 (0=no doubling, I = points x2, II = points x4,III = points x8 etc.).
Add a new round:

 To add a new round you have to change to the add round view. You can do this by a swipe to left gesture.

 For adding a round you have to define the points of the round and which player had win or lose the new round (optinal which player set was suspended at this round).


You can enter the points via the number pad.

 To define which player has won or lose the round simply press on the player name to change the state.

 To mark a player as suspended make a long press on his player name.
